text: Agar ʙa oini sumo ʙargardem, pas az on ki Alloh taolo moro az on nacot ʙaxsid, dar haqiqat, ʙa Alloh taolo duruƣ ʙastaem.Va moro sazovor nest, ki ʙa on ʙozgardem, magar on ki Alloh taolo – Parvardigori mo ʙixohad. Ilmi Parvardigoramon hama cizro faro giriftaast.Bar Alloh taolo tavakkal kardaem. Parvardigoro, mijoni mo va qavmamon ʙa haq dovari kun va Tu ʙehtarin dovari»
